SendPort.Name: DLAP Events Salesforce Application Info Port

PrimaryTransport.Address: Salesforce://send/SELECT Applicant__c.Id as ApplicantId, Applicant__c.External_ID__c as ApplicantExternalID, Applicant__c.Applicant__c.Name as ApplicantName, Applicant__c.Applicant_Relation_Type__c as ApplicantRelationType, Applicant__c.Trade_Name__c a...
PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData: <CustomProps><AdapterConfig vt="8"><Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><CommandType>1</CommandType><ConnectionLifetime>0</ConnectionLifetime><ConnectionString>Login URL={SFADDRESS};Password={SFPASSWORD};Security Token={SFAPIKEY};User={SFUSERNAME};Use Sandbox=True</ConnectionString><MessageIncludeNulls>False</MessageIncludeNulls><MessageNamespace>http://SBA.gov/DLAPEvents/Application_Info__c</MessageNamespace><MessageRootNode>Response</MessageRootNode><MessageRowNode>row</MessageRowNode><RequestRootNode>Request</RequestRootNode><SQLCommand>SELECT Applicant__c.Id as ApplicantId, Applicant__c.External_ID__c as ApplicantExternalID, Applicant__c.Applicant__c.Name as ApplicantName, Applicant__c.Applicant_Relation_Type__c as ApplicantRelationType, Applicant__c.Trade_Name__c as ApplicantTradeName,Application__c.DLAP_Status_Description__c as DLAP_Status_Description__c,Application__c.DLAP_Status__c as DLAP_Status__c, Application__c.Loan_Type__c as ApplicationLoanType, Application__c.Id as ApplicationId, Application__c.Name as ApplicationName, Disaster__c.Name as Disaster_Name, Disaster__c.Disaster_Deadline_Date__c as DisasterDeadlineDate, Contact.LastName as ContactLastName, Contact.FirstName as ContactFirstName, Contact.Organization_Type__c as ContactOrganizationType FROM Application__c LEFT JOIN Applicant__c ON Applicant__c.Application__c = Application__c.Id LEFT JOIN Contact ON Contact.Id = Applicant__c.Contact__c LEFT JOIN Disaster__c ON Disaster__c.Id = Application__c.Disaster_Declaration__c WHERE Application__c.Name = @ApplicationNumber</SQLCommand><SSOAffiliate /><TransportLog><Location>Application</Location><LogMode>3</LogMode><LogType>1</LogType></TransportLog><URIIdentity>Salesforce://send/</URIIdentity><uri>Salesforce://send/SELECT Applicant__c.Id as ApplicantId, Applicant__c.External_ID__c as ApplicantExternalID, Applicant__c.Applicant__c.Name as ApplicantName, Applicant__c.Applicant_Relation_Type__c as ApplicantRelationType, Applicant__c.Trade_Name__c a...</uri></Config></AdapterConfig></CustomProps>

SendPort.Name: DLAP Events Status Salesforce CheckList Item Port

PrimaryTransport.Address: Salesforce://send/SELECT Id FROM Checklist_Item__c WHERE Checklist_Item_Status__c ='Requested' AND Application__c =@ApplicationSFID

SendPort.Name: DLAP Events Oracle Event Notification Port

PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData: <CustomProps><BindingType vt="8">oracleDBBinding</BindingType><BindingConfiguration vt="8"><binding name="oracleDBBinding" closeTimeout="00:02:00" dataFetchSize="15000000" /></BindingConfiguration><InboundBodyPathExpression vt="8" /><OutboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</OutboundBodyLocation><AffiliateApplicationName vt="8" /><StaticAction vt="8">http://Microsoft.LobServices.OracleDB/2007/03/DCMS_INT/View/EVENT_NOTIFICATION_DCMS/Insert</StaticAction><ProxyUserName vt="8" /><ProxyAddress vt="8" /><UserName vt="8">{ORACLEUSERNAME}</UserName><InboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</InboundBodyLocation><EndpointBehaviorConfiguration vt="8"><behavior name="EndpointBehavior" /></EndpointBehaviorConfiguration><OutboundXmlTemplate vt="8"><bts-msg-body xmlns="http://www.microsoft.com/schemas/bts2007" encoding="xml"/></OutboundXmlTemplate><PropagateFaultMessage vt="11">-1</PropagateFaultMessage><InboundNodeEncoding vt="8">Xml</InboundNodeEncoding><Password vt="1" /><IsolationLevel vt="8">Serializable</IsolationLevel><UseSSO vt="11">0</UseSSO><EnableTransaction vt="11">-1</EnableTransaction></CustomProps>

DLAP Events Document Salesforce CheckList Item Port

PrimaryTransport.Address: Salesforce://send/SELECT Id,Name,Case__c,Applicant__c,Application__c,Checklist_Item_Status__c,Checklist_Item_Text__c,Type__c,Verified_Date__c,CreatedDate,Checklist_Item_Due_Date__c, Applicant__c.External_ID__c as ApplicantExternalId FROM Checklist_Item...
PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData: <CustomProps><AdapterConfig vt="8"><Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><CommandType>1</CommandType><ConnectionLifetime>0</ConnectionLifetime><ConnectionString>Login URL={SFADDRESS};Password={SFPASSWORD};Security Token={SFAPIKEY};User={SFUSERNAME};Use Sandbox=True</ConnectionString><MessageIncludeNulls>False</MessageIncludeNulls><MessageNamespace>http://SBA.gov/DLAPEventsDocument/Checklist_Item__c</MessageNamespace><MessageRootNode>Response</MessageRootNode><MessageRowNode>row</MessageRowNode><RequestRootNode>Request</RequestRootNode><SQLCommand>SELECT Id,Name,Case__c,Applicant__c,Application__c,Checklist_Item_Status__c,Checklist_Item_Text__c,Type__c,Verified_Date__c,CreatedDate,Checklist_Item_Due_Date__c, Applicant__c.External_ID__c as ApplicantExternalId FROM Checklist_Item__c LEFT JOIN Applicant__c ON Applicant__c.Id = Applicant__c WHERE Type__c !='Interface' AND Checklist_Item_Status__c ='Requested' AND Id = @ChecklistItemID </SQLCommand><SSOAffiliate /><TransportLog><Location>Application</Location><LogMode>3</LogMode><LogType>1</LogType></TransportLog><URIIdentity>Salesforce://send/</URIIdentity><uri>Salesforce://send/SELECT Id,Name,Case__c,Applicant__c,Application__c,Checklist_Item_Status__c,Checklist_Item_Text__c,Type__c,Verified_Date__c,CreatedDate,Checklist_Item_Due_Date__c, Applicant__c.External_ID__c as ApplicantExternalId FROM Checklist_Item...</uri></Config></AdapterConfig></CustomProps>

SendPort.Name: DLAP Events Document Salesforcet Content Version Port

PrimaryTransport.Address: Salesforce://send/SELECT cv.[Title],cv.[Description],cv.[Document_Type__c],cv.[CreatedDate],cv.[Id],cv.[ContentDocumentId],cv.[DLAP_Document_Type__c],cdl.[LinkedEntityId] FROM [ContentVersion] cv INNER JOIN [ContentDocumentLink] cdl ON cv.[ContentDocum...
PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData: <CustomProps><AdapterConfig vt="8"><Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><CommandType>1</CommandType><ConnectionLifetime>0</ConnectionLifetime><ConnectionString>Login URL={SFADDRESS};Password={SFPASSWORD};Security Token={SFAPIKEY};User={SFUSERNAME};Use Sandbox=True</ConnectionString><MessageIncludeNulls>False</MessageIncludeNulls><MessageNamespace>http://SBA.gov/DLAPEvents/ContentVersion__c</MessageNamespace><MessageRootNode>Response</MessageRootNode><MessageRowNode>row</MessageRowNode><RequestRootNode>Request</RequestRootNode><SQLCommand>SELECT cv.[Title],cv.[Description],cv.[Document_Type__c],cv.[CreatedDate],cv.[Id],cv.[ContentDocumentId],cv.[DLAP_Document_Type__c],cdl.[LinkedEntityId] FROM [ContentVersion] cv INNER JOIN [ContentDocumentLink] cdl ON cv.[ContentDocumentId] = cdl.[ContentDocumentId] WHERE cdl.[LinkedEntityId] = @ApplicationSFID </SQLCommand><SSOAffiliate /><TransportLog><Location>Application</Location><LogMode>3</LogMode><LogType>1</LogType></TransportLog><URIIdentity>Salesforce://send/</URIIdentity><uri>Salesforce://send/SELECT cv.[Title],cv.[Description],cv.[Document_Type__c],cv.[CreatedDate],cv.[Id],cv.[ContentDocumentId],cv.[DLAP_Document_Type__c],cdl.[LinkedEntityId] FROM [ContentVersion] cv INNER JOIN [ContentDocumentLink] cdl ON cv.[ContentDocum...</uri></Config></AdapterConfig></CustomProps>
